main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Silver Spring, Maryland, on April 2, 1952, with a description of a possibly illuminated and soundless object.
interesting points: The witness observed an object ascending without making any noise., The object was described as illuminated and changing formation., The air was still during the sighting., The witnessâ€™s daughter remarked about seeing 'Mollies dancing' during the event., There was no physical evidence of the sighting found.
